'''"Chill Afternoon Tea Time"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Chill Afternoon Tea Time" is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in the [[New Fontaine Research Institute]] after defeating a group of [[Clockwork Meka]].
